required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Phase 1 Trial of OPA-15406 Ointment in Healthy Adult Male Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-center, Placebo-controlled, Randomized, Double-blind, Parallel-group Comparison Trial to Assess the Safety and Pharmacokinetics of OPA-15406 Ointment in Healthy Adult Male Subjects (Phase 1 Trial)

brief_summary.textblock: To assess the safety (especially skin findings) and pharmacokinetics by applying 0.3%, 1%, or 3% formulation of 5g OPA-15406 ointment to a 1000 cm2 area as a single-dose and as a multiple-dose twice daily for 2 weeks in Japanese healthy adult male subjects.

primary_outcome.measure: Cmax of OPA-15406 in a Single Administration Period
primary_outcome.description: We measure the plasma concentration of OPA-15406 at Day 1 by applying 0.3%, 1%, or 3% formulation of OPA-15406 ointment as a single dose. We assess the Cmax of OPA-15406.

primary_outcome.measure: Cmax of OPA-15406 in the Multiple Administration Period
primary_outcome.description: We measure the plasma concentration of OPA-15406 from Day 1 to Day 14 by applying 0.3%, 1%, or 3% formulation of OPA-15406 ointment as multiple doses twice daily for 2 weeks. We assess the AUC12h x of OPA-15406.

secondary_outcome.measure: AUC12h of OPA-15406 in a Single Administration Period
secondary_outcome.description: We measure the plasma concentration of OPA-15406 at Day 1 by applying 0.3%, 1%, or 3% formulation of OPA-15406 ointment as a single dose. We assess the AUC12h x of OPA-15406.

secondary_outcome.measure: AUC12h of OPA-15406 in the Multiple Administration Period
secondary_outcome.description: We measure the plasma concentration of OPA-15406 from Day 1 to Day 14 by applying 0.3%, 1%, or 3% formulation of OPA-15406 ointment as multiple doses twice daily for 2 weeks. We assess the AUC12h x of OPA-15406.

arm_group.arm_group_label: 0.3% OPA-15406 in a single administration period
arm_group.description: 32 subjects were randomly allocated to 4 treatment groups (8 subjects per dose). In a single administration period, subjects were treated with assigned0.3% OPA-15406 ointment assessed until 48 hours postdose.

arm_group.arm_group_label: 1% OPA-15406 in a single administration period
arm_group.description: 32 subjects were randomly allocated to 4 treatment groups (8 subjects per dose). In a single administration period, subjects were treated with assigned 1% OPA-15406 ointment assessed until 48 hours postdose.

arm_group.arm_group_label: 3% OPA-15406 in a single administration period
arm_group.description: 32 subjects were randomly allocated to 4 treatment groups (8 subjects per dose). In a single administration period, subjects were treated with assigned 3% OPA-15406 ointment assessed until 48 hours postdose.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Placebo in a single administration period
arm_group.description: 32 subjects were randomly allocated to 4 treatment groups (8 subjects per dose). In a single administration period, subjects were treated with assigned placebo ointment assessed until 48 hours postdose.

arm_group.arm_group_label: 0.3% OPA-15406 in the multiple administration period
arm_group.description: In the multiple administration period, same subjects were treated with assigned 0.3% OPA-15406 ointment twice daily for 14 days and assessed until 48 hours post dose.

arm_group.arm_group_label: 1% OPA-15406 in the multiple administration period
arm_group.description: In the multiple administration period, same subjects were treated with assigned 1% OPA-15406 ointment twice daily for 14 days and assessed until 48 hours post dose.

arm_group.arm_group_label: 3% OPA-15406 in the multiple administration period
arm_group.description: In the multiple administration period, same subjects were treated with assigned 3% OPA-15406 ointment twice daily for 14 days and assessed until 48 hours post dose.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Placebo in the multiple administration period
arm_group.description: In the multiple administration period, same subjects were treated with assigned OPA-15406 ointment placebo twice daily for 14 days and assessed until 48 hours post dose.

intervention.description: 32 subjects were randomly allocated to 4 treatment groups (8 subjects per dose). In a single administration period, subjects were treated with assigned 0.3 % OPA-15406 ointment assessed until 48 hours postdose. In the multiple administration period, same subjects were treated with assigned 0.3% OPA-15406 ointment twice daily for 14 days and assessed until 48 hours post dose.

In a single administration periodriod, subjects were treated with assigned placebo ointment assessed until 48 hours postdose. Placebo in the multiple administration period

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- BMI = Body weight (kg) / [Height (m)]2: at least 18.5 and less than 25.0
- Judged by the investigator or subinvestigator to be healthy based on test results at screening and prior to administration on Day 1 of the treatment period
Exclusion Criteria:
- Findings (sunburn, abrasions, tattoos, etc) on the back that affect the evaluation of the safety of the skin
- Judged by the investigator or subinvestigator as inappropriate to participate in this trial for any other reasons

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
